name: Stoiximan.gr Live Streaming FULL Screen
description:
1. Download Stylus Add-On 

Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/el/firefox/addon/styl-us/
Chrome: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylus/clngdbkpkpeebahjckkjfobafhncgmne
Opera: https://addons.opera.com/el/extensions/details/stylus/

2. Install my script

3. To deactivate it, just turn all styles off from the addon settings
